import React from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import getproductsCB from '../../api/api' const ProdScreen = (props) => { const [state, setstate] = React.useState([]) const ActiveFunction = async () => { const result = await getproductsCB(); const CB = JSON.parse(result) setstate(CB.Table) } React.useEffect(() => { ActiveFunction() }, []) // const product = null // if (state) { // } console.log(props.match.params.id) console.log(state) const product = state.find(x => x.id == props.match.params.id); console.log(state) return (
{/*
Back to result
  • {product.name} Price: {product.price}
  • Description:
    {product.description}
  • Qty:
*/}
); } export default ProdScreen
